content: {"locationId": "11637", "organizationId": "9132", "name": "Lunenburg Gilman and Concord Senior Citizens inc", "address1": "19 Parrish st", "address2": "", "city": "Gilman", "state": "VT", "zipCode": "05904", "country": null, "phone": "802-892-1052", "phoneExt": "", "website": "", "latitude": "44.4140292", "longitude": "-71.7166749", "foodPrograms": "Food Distribution, Hot/Cold Meal Program", "serviceAreas": "COUNTY:  Essex", "languages": "", "features": "Air Conditioning", "aboutUs": "Our Gilman Senior Center offers a meal site, a place that prepares and distributes Meals on Wheels for housebound as well as a safe warm in the winter and cool in the summer spot for Community Members.  Weekly Bingo is offered on Monday nights and is available for Community gatherings when needed.", "notes": "", "contactName": "Pam Kathan", "contactPhone": "802-892-1052", "contactEmail": "gilmanseniors@gmail.com", "servicePrograms": "", "foodServiceTypes": "", "dietRestrictions": "", "foodOfferings": "", "networkAffiliations": [{"regionId": 73, "regionName": "Vermont Foodbank", "logoBlobNameSmall": "0372d5bd-e181-4692-bc7f-4880d66560ee.png", "website": "https://www.vtfoodbank.org/"}], "timeZoneName": "Eastern Standard Time", "timeZoneCode": "ET", "offsetHours": "-4", "schedules": ["Tuesday 11:30 AM-1:00 PM", "Wednesday 11:30 AM-1:00 PM", "Thursday 11:30 AM-1:00 PM", "Friday 11:30 AM-1:00 PM", "Saturday 10:00 AM-12:00 PM (Last Saturday of each month)"], "services": [], "specialHours": []}
